name: La chute des tours
summary: Suitable for all ages, "La chute des tours" is an asymmetric game where every piece is unique and can become the masterpiece of your strategy. From the beginning of the game play, you will have the opportunity to place your towers and to startle your opponent. But be careful, the opposite is possible too ! Developed in order to drastically reduce predictable situations for those who have an advanced level, the game also offer multiple combinations, thanks to which beginners can also get by. Even though the learning of the properties of all pieces will seem complex and tricky in the beginning, the richness of available movments will allow you a gret freedom of action. And always keep in mind that if chance could bring you opportunities, only the one who has taken the right decisions at the right time will have the upper hand. Now, your turn to play !
